question:
Your local hospital has advertised for people to do unpaid work helping at the hospital. You would like to do some work at the hospital in your free time. Write a letter to the hospital. 


In your letter explain why you would like to do unpaid work at the hospital, say what type of unpaid work you would be able to do give details of when you would be available for this work
text: I am writing to you because of an advertisement I saw about volunteering at the hospital. I am extremely interested in collaborating with your institution because I would like to bring back to the place that helped my mother get better and eventually, overcome her illness. A few months ago, she was extremely sick and thanks to your hospitality, she felt at home.

While I do not particularly know the kind of help I could offer, I do feel ,however, that I would be really happy if I could be close to cancer patients, even if it just means helping out by bringing their breakfasts. For the last two years, I acquired plenty of experience with basic health care, after dealing with my own mother's cancer.

I am currently studying a Master's degree in Psychology at ASU, so I will probably have more available time on weekends (any time) or holidays. I would highly appreciate it if you would give me the opportunity to assist the hospital and make an impact in my community.
I am looking forward to hearing from you
